77121.summary: Some customers in Hinton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77121.title: May 23 - Hinton | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

77127.title: May 23 - Calgary (Coral Springs) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
